main event: Mr. and Mrs. C., aged 81 and 80 respectively, observed a bright object changing shape from round to heart-shaped in Sacramento, California on November 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object was initially described as round then changed to heart-shaped,The object was approximately 15 feet in diameter and bright red,The witnesses observed the object for about 15 to 20 minutes as it moved slowly westward,The object displayed a bright then weak appearance but did not disappear,No other corroborating witnesses or reports were found from local law enforcement.
sighted object: a bright red object that changed shape
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. C., 81 years of age and 80 years of age
